text: Peter Georg Schowtka (; 7 January 1945 â€“ 5 August 2022) was a German politician. He was a member of the Landtag of Saxony from 1991 to 2014. Schowtka died on 5 August 2022 at the age of 77. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Saxony Category:German mayors
